mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (member_id, title, memo, snapshot_json, report_summary, created_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{memo}, CAST(#{snapshotJson} AS jsonb), CAST(#{reportSummary} AS jsonb), now())
mapper.select: SELECT report_id AS reportId, member_id AS memberId, title, memo, snapshot_json AS snapshotJson, report_summary AS reportSummary, created_at AS createdAt FROM report WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
